synopsis.text:
He ading into the 21st century, Tokyo was left in ruins after a catastrophic earthquake, plunging Japan into chaos and lawlessness. The once thriving metropolis is now a playground for ruthless gangs, with the formidable Koryukai syndicate ruling the streets.

Enter Takateru Suga, a man on a mission to rescue his kidnapped sister from the clutches of the Koryukai. As he delves deeper into the underworld, he discovers an ancient legend foretelling the return of powerful warriors destined to continue their age-old battle. Unbeknownst to him, Takateru is one of these reincarnated heroes.

Joined by an eccentric ensemble of allies - a drag queen, a pair of battle-hardened mercenaries, and a nun - Takateru embarks on a dangerous journey to dismantle the crime syndicate and save his sister. Together, they must navigate the treacherous streets of Tokyo, battling against overwhelming odds in their quest for justice.

Can this unlikely team of heroes harness their newfound power and bring down the Koryukai, or will they succumb to the darkness that has consumed the city? Only time will tell, as the stage is set for an epic showdown between the forces of good and evil in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
